member.name: T:CommNetManagerAPI.CNMAttrAndOr
member.summary:
Method attribute used to specify if the method returning a bool should be joined to other cooperating methods using AND or OR.
WARNING: Methods that implement 'OR' MUST NOT call base.method() in their body.
Since the stock method will be called anyway, methods should not call base.method() anyway in their body if they detect a CommNetManager installation.
Instead, methods implementing 'AND' should return true and methods implementing 'OR' should return false.
NOTE: Methods implementing 'OR' should generally also be marked 'EARLY' and methods implementing 'AND' should generally be marked 'LATE'.

member.name: M:CommNetManagerAPI.CNMAttrAndOr.#ctor(CommNetManagerAPI.CNMAttrAndOr.options)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:CommNetManagerAPI.CNMAttrSequence
member.summary:
Method attribute used to specify if the method should be called before or after the stock method.
CAUTION: Methods should not call base.method() in their body if they detect a CommNetManager installation.

member.name: M:CommNetManagerAPI.CNMAttrSequence.#ctor(CommNetManagerAPI.CNMAttrSequence.options)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:CommNetManagerAPI.CNMAttrBefore
member.summary:
Method attribute to specify that the method in question should precede the target type's method.
Not yet implemented.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:CommNetManagerAPI.CNMAttrAfter
member.summary:

Not yet implemented.

member.name: M:CommNetManagerAPI.CNMAttrAfter.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:CommNetManagerAPI.CommNetManagerChecker
member.summary: Static API class to facilitate checking if CommNetManager is installed.
member.remarks:
Use to determine if CommNetManager is installed.
Use to activate CommNetManager if it is installed.
Use to get the handle to the current CommNetManagerNetwork instance.

member.name: P:CommNetManagerAPI.CommNetManagerChecker.CommNetNetwork
member.summary: Gets the current instance.

member.name: P:CommNetManagerAPI.CommNetManagerChecker.CommNetManagerInstalled
member.summary: Checks if CommNetManager is installed.
member.remarks: Result is cached to minimize Reflection calls.

member.name: M:CommNetManagerAPI.CommNetManagerChecker.GetCommNetManagerInstance
member.summary: Gets the current instance of the CommNetManager. Can be cast to .
member.returns: Null if CommNetManager is not installed.

member.name: M:CommNetManagerAPI.CommNetManagerChecker.GetCommNetManagerNetwork
member.summary: Gets the current instance of the CommNet. Can be cast to .
member.returns: Null if CommNetManager is not installed.

member.name: M:CommNetManagerAPI.CommNetManagerChecker.BindToCommNetManager(CommNet.CommNetwork)
member.summary: Binds the provided CommNetwork to the current CommNetManagerNetwork instance.
member.param: The derived CommNetwork instance which should be bound to CommNetManagerNetwork.
member.returns: True if succesful at binding, false if not.
member.remarks:
This method links the protected fields inherited from CommNet.Network.Net
CAUTION: When bound to CommNetManager, you should ensure the following methods do not call base.method():
Add
Remove
Connect
Disconnect
Rebuild

member.name: M:CommNetManagerAPI.CommNetManagerChecker.SetCommNetManagerIfAvailable(CommNet.CommNetScenario,System.Type,CommNet.CommNetNetwork@)
member.summary: Sets the CommNetNetwork object to be CommNetManager if CommNetManager is installed or a supplied type if it is not.
member.param: Type of your network to instantiate if CommNetManager is not installed.
The handle of the CommNetNetwork object that is being implemented.
member.returns: True if CommNetManager or the supplied Net was instantiated, false if not.

member.name: M:CommNetManagerAPI.CommNetManagerChecker.SetCommNetManagerIfAvailable(CommNet.CommNetScenario,System.Type)
member.summary: Sets the CommNetNetwork object to be CommNetManager if CommNetManager is installed or a supplied type if it is not.
member.param: Type of your network to instantiate if CommNetManager is not installed.
member.returns: True if CommNetManager or the supplied Net was instantiated, False if not.

member.name: M:CommNetManagerAPI.CommNetManagerChecker.SetCommNetManagerIfAvailable(CommNet.CommNetScenario,CommNet.CommNetNetwork@)
member.summary: Sets the CommNetNetwork object to be CommNetManager if CommNetManager is installed.
member.param: The handle of the CommNetNetwork object that is being implemented.
member.returns: True if CommNetManager or the supplied Net was instantiated, False if not.

member.name: M:CommNetManagerAPI.CommNetManagerChecker.SetCommNetManagerIfAvailable(CommNet.CommNetScenario)
member.summary: Sets the CommNetNetwork object to be CommNetManager if CommNetManager is installed.
member.returns: True if CommNetManager or the supplied Net was instantiated, False if not.
